subTitle: Settings for the Fotorama Slider only.

param19.description: Values: false, true, or integer value in milliseconds
param19.info: Autoplay or loop the slider. On with "true" or any numeric interval in milliseconds. Of with "false"

param18.info: Loop through images (proceed with first slide after reaching the last one)

param20.info: Show arrows for the slider control. 'always' : Do not hide controls on hover or tap

param10.info: Width of the Thumbnailbar in percent relative to Slider size.
